column22: Ideal images should reflect the activity participants will experience, rather than a logo. Acceptable "web friendly" formats: png, jpeg, webp. Recommended dimensions: 600√ó400 pixels.

column1: GLOBE Observer Connect: GLOBE and Artificial Intelligence
column20: GLOBE Observer Connect is a short conversation with scientists and GLOBE staff to explore a few ways AI is being used in GLOBE or with GLOBE data.
column21: Artificial intelligence or AI is more than a buzz word: it can be a powerful tool and it is enhancing GLOBE for good. Join us for a GLOBE Observer Connect conversation on 17 July at 12 pm ET (16:00 UTC) to explore a few ways AI is being used in GLOBE or with GLOBE data.
column30: Computers and technology, Ecology and Environment
column32: GLOBE, artificial intelligence, photography, image recognition, virtual event, citizen science
